# NSLog(_:_:)

**Function**

Logs an error message to the Apple System Log facility.

## Declaration

```swift
func NSLog(_ format: String, _ args: any CVarArg...)
```

## Diagnostics and Debugging

- **NSLogv(_:_:)**: Logs an error message to the Apple System Log facility.
